widgetInfo:
<LinearLayout
  width="@data{width}"
  height="match_content"
  userId="node_dockcviv8fo1"
  orientation="vertical"
  cornerRadius="6np"
  backgroundColor="@dtDarkModeAdapter{'#FFFFFF', '#1E1E1E'}">
 <LinearLayout
   width="match_parent"
   height="match_content"
   marginTop="12np"
   marginLeft="12np"
   marginRight="12np"
   userId="node_ocly2oum563">
   <ImageView
     width="16np"
     height="16np"
     imageUrl="@concat{'$iQElAqNwbmcDBgTMkAXMkAbaACGEAaQhK2wZAqqarYgS0sdoKLoFA88AAAGO4hz0WQTNEMkHAAgACbdpbnRlcmFjdGl2ZS1jYXJkLWVkaXRvcg', ''}"
     marginRight="8np"
     gravity="leftCenter">

   </ImageView>
   <FastTextView
     textSize="15np"
     textColor="@dtDarkModeAdapter{'#171A1D', '#EEF2F8'}"
     width="match_parent"
     maxLines="1"
     lineHeight="18np"
     text="@toStr{@data{data.cardData.title}}"
     lineBreakMode="end"
     height="match_content">

   </FastTextView>

 </LinearLayout>
 <LinearLayout
   width="match_parent"
   height="match_content"
   marginTop="12np"
   marginLeft="12np"
   marginRight="12np"
   marginBottom="12np"
   userId="node_ocly2oum561">
   <FastTextView
     textSize="15np"
     width="match_parent"
     maxLines="1"
     lineHeight="18np"
     text="当前版本不支持表单组件"
     lineBreakMode="end"
     height="match_content">

   </FastTextView>

 </LinearLayout>

</LinearLayout>
